title: Quarkus Hibernate Reactive failes to read data while rendering via Qute template
body:
### Describe the bug

While using Qute with reactive hibernate and panache to fetch the list of entries from database, it gives an exception saying

```
java.lang.IllegalStateException: HR000061: Session is currently connecting to database
	at org.hibernate.reactive.pool.impl.ProxyConnection.withConnection(ProxyConnection.java:66)
	at org.hibernate.reactive.pool.impl.ProxyConnection.selectJdbc(ProxyConnection.java:129)
	at org.hibernate.reactive.pool.BatchingConnection.selectJdbc(BatchingConnection.java:173)
	at org.hibernate.reactive.loader.ReactiveLoader.executeReactiveQueryStatement(ReactiveLoader.java:128)

	at io.vertx.ext.web.impl.RoutingContextImplBase.iterateNext(RoutingContextImplBase.java:136)

	at java.base/java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:829)

```


### Expected behavior

I must be seeing the list of blogs that are stored in the database.

### Actual behavior


While loading the screen it fails with below exception and this only happens for a few seconds and after then fetching the list again wont give any errors.

```  
java.lang.IllegalStateException: HR000061: Session is currently connecting to database
	at org.hibernate.reactive.pool.impl.ProxyConnection.withConnection(ProxyConnection.java:66)

### How to Reproduce?

I am attaching the complete dependency section here to share how am I accessing the db to read the information.

```
dependencies {
    implementation(enforcedPlatform("${quarkusPlatformGroupId}:${quarkusPlatformArtifactId}:${quarkusPlatformVersion}"))
    implementation("io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive-jackson")
    implementation("io.quarkus:quarkus-resteasy-reactive-qute")
    implementation("io.quarkus:quarkus-arc")
    implementation("org.webjars:jquery:3.6.1")
    implementation("org.webjars:bootstrap:5.2.2")
    testImplementation("io.quarkus:quarkus-junit5")
    testImplementation("io.rest-assured:rest-assured")
    implementation(kotlin("stdlib-jdk8"))
    implementation("io.quarkus:quarkus-hibernate-reactive-panache")
    implementation("io.quarkus:quarkus-reactive-mysql-client")
    // https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.netty/netty-transport-native-epoll
    implementation("io.netty:netty-transport-native-epoll::linux-x86_64")
}```

And this is how information is being accessed.


```

@Entity(name="blogs")
class Blog {
    @Id
    @SequenceGenerator(name="blogSequence", sequenceName = "blog_id_seq",allocationSize = 1, initialValue = 1)
    @GeneratedValue(generator = "blogSequence")
    var id:Long = 0
    lateinit var content:String
    var createdAt: Date = Date()
    var lastUpdatedAt: Date? = null
}

 ```


```
@Inject
    lateinit var blogListView:Template

@Path("/list")
    @GET
    @Produces(MediaType.TEXT_HTML)
    fun blogList():TemplateInstance{
        return blogListView.data("blogs",blogRepository.listAll())
    }
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.15" 2022-04-19

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.13.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 7.5.1 ------------------------------------------------------------  Build time:   2022-08-05 21:17:56 UTC Revision:     d1daa0cbf1a0103000b71484e1dbfe096e095918  Kotlin:       1.6.21 Groovy:       3.0.10 Ant:          Apache Ant(TM) version 1.10.11 compiled on July 10 2021 JVM:          11.0.15 (GraalVM Community 11.0.15+10-jvmci-22.1-b06) OS:           Linux 5.15.0-48-generic amd64

### Additional information

_No response_
